scripts.startBscTestnet: truffle migrate --network bscTestnet --all --reset && truffle run verify NftStaking --network bscTestnet
scripts.startBscMainnet: truffle migrate --network bscMainnet --reset && truffle run verify NftStaking --network bscMainnet
scripts.startRinkeby: sudo truffle migrate --network rinkeby --reset && truffle run verify NftStaking --network rinkeby
scripts.startEthMainnet: truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset && truffle run verify NftStaking --network mainnet
scripts.startInnovate: truffle migrate --network %(grep DEPLOY_NETWORK .env)% --reset && truffle run verify NftStaking --network $(grep DEPLOY_NETWORK .env)
